property.name: Text
property.value: α: -X. X is the number of Guest enemies in play. β: -1. If there is an Innocent enemy in the victory display, reveal another chaos token. γ: -3. You may place one of your clues on your location to treat this as a -1 instead. δ: -3. If you fail and there is an Innocent enemy in the victory display, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: -X. X is the number of Innocent enemies in play. β: -2. If there is an Innocent enemy in the victory display, reveal another chaos token. γ: -5. You may place one of your clues on your location to treat this as a -2 instead. δ: -3. If you fail, take 1 horror for each Innocent enemy in the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put the set-aside Sergeant Monroe into play in the Foyer. Spawn 1 set-aside Arkham Officer enemy at the Second Floor Hall (if there are 3 or 4 investigators in the game, spawn another set-aside Arkham Officer enemy at the Foyer). Then shuffle each other set-aside Arkham Officer enemy into the encounter deck, along with the encounter discard pile. The lead investigator draws the set-aside What Have You Done? weakness. For each of the following circumstances which is true, place 1 clue on Room 225 (from the token bank) and place 1 doom on an Arkham Officer: — The investigators have not "cleaned up the blood." — The investigators have not "hid the body." — The investigators have not "tidied up the room."

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – After an investigator at the same location as a ready Police enemy discovers 1 or more clues at that location or deals damage to a Humanoid enemy: Each ready Police enemy at that location engages that investigator and makes an immediate attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: The investigators failed to solve the crime and clear their names! (->R3)

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend 1π clues as a group: Draw the top card of the Leads deck. Objective – If the investigators control two Lead assets, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put each of the set-aside locations into play. Remove the remainder of the Leads deck from the game. Depending on which Lead assets are in play, shuffle 6 cards into the encounter deck, as follows, along with the encounter discard pile: — If Alien Device is in play, shuffle the 3 set-aside copies of Encephalon Signal into the encounter deck. — If Manager's Key is in play, shuffle the 3 set-aside copies of Hotel Security into the encounter deck. — If Tome of Rituals is in play, shuffle the 3 set-aside copies of Cultist of the Enclave into the encounter deck. — If Sinister Solution is in play, shuffle the 3 set-aside copies of Morbid Awareness into the encounter deck. — If Time-Worn Locket is in play, shuffle the 3 set-aside copies of Chilling Presence into the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective – Learn more about your leads by placing clues on them (using abilities on some locations). The more clues, the better. At the end of the round, you may choose to advance if each Lead asset has at least 1π clues on it. (Hint: If you wish to present this evidence to the police, you may wish to have at least 2π clues on each Lead asset, instead.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Read Scenario Interlude: The Truth on page 10 of the Rules Booklet.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Fight. You get +2 ή for this attack. η Exhaust Bloodstained Dagger and take 1 horror: Fight. You get +2 ή and deal +1 damage for this attack. If this attack defeats an enemy, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put What Have You Done? into play in your threat area. As an additional cost for you to parley, you must discard a card at random from your hand. η: Shuffle What Have You Done? into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sergeant Monroe may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to any investigator at his location, even if he is uncontrolled. ι When Sergeant Monroe is dealt any amount of damage or horror, exhaust him: Deal that much damage to a non-Innocent enemy at his location. Any investigator at Sergeant Monroe's location may trigger this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Patrol (nearest location with clues). Forced – At the end of the enemy phase: Move 1 clue to Arkham Officer from its location, flipping it to its doom side. η: Parley. Test ά (3). If you succeed, either automatically evade Arkham Officer, or flip one of its doom to its clue side and take control of it. Victory 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Test ά (3). If you succeed, remember that the investigators "cleaned up the blood." η: Test ή (3). If you succeed, remember that the investigators "hid the body." η: Test έ (3). If you succeed, remember that the investigators "tidied up the room."

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Choose a Humanoid enemy at Suite Balcony and test ή or ί (4). If you succeed, take 1 direct horror and defeat the chosen enemy (if that enemy is Elite, deal 2 damage to it instead). This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you enter this location: You may immediately move to a connecting location. If you do, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If a α, β, γ, δ, or ζ symbol is revealed, draw the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Resign. You flee the scene of the crime. Forced – When you attempt to move out of the Foyer while there is at least 1 Guest enemy here: Test ί (X), where X is the number of Guest enemies here. If you fail, you must spend 1 additional action to move out of the Foyer.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend 2 resources: You place an order while enduring the withering glares of the entire waitstaff. At the end of your turn, if you are still at the Restaurant, you may take 1 horror to heal 3 damage. (Limit once per game.) θ If each location in play is revealed and there are no clues on locations in play: Place 1π clues on Restaurant (from the token bank.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Test ί (4) or ή (4). If you succeed, move to either Room 212, Room 225, or Room 245. η: Test ά (3). If you succeed, move any number of clues controlled by investigators at this location to Alien Device (if it is in play).

property.name: Text
property.value: The door to Room 212 is locked. You cannot enter Room 212 from the Second Floor Hall. Second Floor Hall gains: "η: Test ί (4) to attempt to pick the lock. If you succeed, reveal Room 212 and immediately move to it."

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Test έ (3). If you succeed, move any number of clues controlled by investigators at this location to Sinister Solution (if it is in play).

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Test έ (3). Only the top card of your discard pile may be committed to this skill test (place it on the bottom of your deck after this test resolves). If you succeed, move any number of clues controlled by investigators in Room 245 to Time-Worn Locket (if it is in play).

property.name: Text
property.value: The door to the Office is locked. You cannot enter the Office unless you control the Manager's Key. Basement gains: "η: Test ί (3) to attempt to pick the lock. If you succeed, reveal Office and immediately move to it."

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Test έ (0). For each point you succeed by, you may move 1 clue controlled by an investigator in the Office to Manager's key (if it is in play).

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Test έ (1). If you succeed, move a Humanoid enemy at any location once toward the Basement. ι After you defeat an enemy in the Basement: Move any number of clues controlled by investigators at the Basement to Tome of Rituals (if it is in play).

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn – Foyer. Hunter. Forced – After Mr. Trombly enters play: Immediately resolve the hunter and patrol keywords on each other Staff enemy in play. Victory 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn – Nearest Crime Scene location. Prey – Most clues. Hunter

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn – Nearest Hall location. Aloof. Patrol (nearest Crime Scene location). Forced – At the end of the enemy phase, if Hotel Guest is at a Crime Scene location: Add 1 doom to Hotel Guest. η: Parley. Test ά or έ (3). If you succeed, discard Hotel Guest. Victory 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – In player order, each investigator at your location must choose: — Test ί (3) to attempt to flee before the gas fills the room. If you succeed, move to a connecting location. If you fail, take 2 damage. — Test ή (3) to attempt to hold your breath. For each point you fail by, take 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – If there are no Humanoid enemies in play, Driven to Madness gains surge. Otherwise, attach Driven to Madness to the nearest Humanoid enemy. Attached enemy gets +1 fight, +1 health, and +1 evade. Attached enemy loses aloof. Investigators cannot parley with attached enemy. Forced – After attached enemy is evaded: Discard Driven to Madness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ά (2). Increase the difficulty of this test by 1 for each Innocent enemy in the victory display. If you fail, take 2 horror (if you are at a Crime Scene location, you must also choose and discard a card from your hand).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Attach to the nearest non-Crime Scene location. Attached location gains the Crime Scene trait and gets +2 shroud. ι When you successfully investigate attached location: Instead of discovering clues, discard Incriminating Evidence.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – If there are no Humanoid enemies in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Humanoid enemy, draw it, and shuffle the encounter deck. Otherwise, the nearest Humanoid enemy readies, moves (one location at a time) until it reaches your location, engages you, and makes an immediate attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put into play in your play area. Forced – When you are defeated: Give control of Alien Device to another investigator.

property.name: Text
property.value: Retaliate. Forced – When Otherworldly Meddler would take damage from an attack: Remove 1 doom from Otherworldly Meddler and reduce that damage by 1. Forced – After an investigator is defeated: Add 3 doom to Otherworldly Meddler. Victory 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation – Place 1 doom on Otherworldly Meddler (if it is in play) and test ά (4). If you fail, you must either (choose one): — Take 2 horror. — Deal 2 damage to an investigator or Humanoid enemy at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put into play in your play area. Forced – When you are defeated: Give control of Manager's Key to another investigator.

property.name: Text
property.value: Massive. Retaliate. Each Guest enemy loses patrol and gains surge. Forced – At the start of the enemy phase: Add 1 Guest enemy at Hotel Manager's location to the victory display, then place 2 doom on Hotel Manager. Move each other Guest enemy one location toward Hotel Manager.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn – Nearest empty location. Hunter. Retaliate. If there is at least 1 Guest enemy in play, Hotel Security loses hunter and gains "Patrol (nearest location with a Guest enemy)."

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put into play in your play area. Forced – When you are defeated: Give control of Tome of Rituals to another investigator.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Forced – After Dimensional Shambler deals you damage from its attack: Reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If an ζ symbol is revealed, it snatches you from this dimension; remove Dimensional Shambler from the game and you are defeated.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn – Basement. Hunter. Forced – After Cultist of the Enclave attacks: Reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If a α, β, γ, δ, or ζ symbol is revealed, place 1 doom on the current agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put into play in your play area. Forced – When you are defeated: Give control of Sinister Solution to another investigator.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – At the end of the investigation phase: Each investigator at attached location takes 1 damage and 1 horror. Each other investigator must either take 1 damage or 1 horror (their choice).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ά (6). Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1 for each location away from Room 212 you are. If you fail, you must either place 1 of your clues on your location, or take 2 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Put into play in your play area. Forced – When you are defeated: Give control of Time-Worn Locket to another investigator.

property.name: Text
property.value: Patrol (Room 245). Retaliate. Forced – When damage would be placed on Vengeful Specter: Reduce that damage to 1 unless it was dealt by a Spell, Relic, Charm, or encounter card. Victory 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation – Test ά (3). For each point you fail by, take 1 horror. For each point you succeed by, you may deal 1 damage to a Geist enemy at your location. If an ε symbol is revealed during this test, you may deal 2 damage to a Geist enemy at any location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Alien Device gains: "η If Vengeful Specter is exhausted and at your location, remove 2 clues from Alien Device: Deal 2 damage to Vengeful Specter." Objective – If Vengeful Specter is defeated, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this agenda advanced by reaching its doom threshold: (->R2) If this agenda advanced because you completed its objective: (->R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Sinister Solution gains: "η If you are in Room 212: Test έ (2). If you succeed, you may remove 2 clues from Sinister Solution to either exhaust Otherworldly Meddler or deal it 2 damage." Objective – If Otherworldly Meddler is defeated, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this agenda advanced by reaching its doom threshold: (->R2) If this agenda advanced because you completed its objective: (->R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Alien Device gains: "η Exhaust Alien Device and remove 2 clues from it: Add a Staff enemy at your location to the victory display (or deal it 2 damage if it is Elite). Does not provoke attacks of opportunity." Objective – If Hotel Manager is defeated, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this agenda advanced by reaching its doom threshold: (->R2) If this agenda advanced because you completed its objective: (->R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Tome of Rituals gains: "η Remove 2 clues from Tome of Rituals: Fight. This attack uses ά instead of ή. If you succeed, instead of dealing damage, remove 3 doom from the attacked enemy. Obective – If Otherworldly Meddler is defeated or has no doom on it, advance."

property.name: Text
property.value: If this agenda advanced by reaching its doom threshold: (->R2) If this agenda advanced because you completed its objective: (->R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Sinister Solution gains: "η If Vengeful Specter is at y our location: Test έ (1). For each point you succeed by, move 1 clue from Sinister Solution to Vengeful Specter. Does not provoke attacks of opportunity." Objective – If Vengeful Specter is defeated or has clues on it equal to its remaining health, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this agenda advanced by reaching its doom threshold: (->R2) If this agenda advanced because you completed its objective: (->R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Time-Worn Locket gains: "ι When Hotel Manager would attack an investigator at your location, remove 2 clues from Time-Worn Locket: Cancel that attack." Objective – If Hotel Manager is defeated, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this agenda advanced by reaching its doom threshold: (->R2) If this agenda advanced because you completed its objective: (->R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Guest enemy loses Victory 0, loses Innocent, and gains Cultist. Each Lead asset gains: "η If Dimensional Shambler is at your location, remove 1 clue from this asset: Evade. Automatically evade Dimensional Shambler. Objective – If there are no Cultist enemies in play, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this agenda advanced by reaching its doom threshold: (->R2) If this agenda advanced because you completed its objective: (->R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Lead asset gains: "η Remove 1 clue from this asset: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Staff enemy and draw it. Shuffle the encounter deck." ι After a Staff enemy is defeated, Deal 1 horror to Harvested Brain. Objective – If there is 2 plus 1π horror on Harvested Brain, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this agenda advanced by reaching its doom threshold: (->R2) If this agenda advanced because you completed its objective: (->R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Room 212 gains: "η If Tome of Rituals is at this location: Test Willlpower (5) or έ (5). If you succeed, move up to 1π clues from Tome of Rituals to Harvested Brain. Objective – If Harvested Brain has 3π clues on it, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this agenda advanced by reaching its doom threshold: (->R2) If this agenda advanced because you completed its objective: (->R1)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Guest enemy loses Victory 0, loses Innocent, and gains Cultist. Basement gains: "η: Test ά (4) or ί (4). You may remove 1 clue from a Lead asset in the Basement to reduce the difficulty of this test by 2. If you succeed, remove 1 doom from the agenda. Objective – If there is no doom on this agenda, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this agenda advanced by reaching its doom threshold: (->R2) If this agenda advanced because you completed its objective: (->R1)
